entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @realDonaldTrump I am more angry at the orange baffoon in the WH who doesn't have a high enough IQ to understand the Intelligence Reports warning him that we were going to get hit with a pandemic. In fact, everyday I pray the orange baffoon gets coronavirus. Every. Single. Day.
